metadata.Title: CVE-2018-18956 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium.
metadata.Description: The ProcessMimeEntity function in util-decode-mime.c in Suricata 4.x before 4.0.6 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service (segfault and daemon crash) via crafted input to the SMTP parser, as exploited in the wild in November 2018.

criterions.comment: suricata: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needs-triage').
